fv: The boughs that bear most hang lowest

intro.title: Exploring My Journey
intro.content:
Hi, I'm Quang Vu, a senior full-stack developer with 5.5 years of experience.
Let's collaborate to create amazing web applications together!

skill.title: Skill
skill.content: After investing significant time in learning and working, I have acquired and nurtured essential skills
skill.1 content: Specializing in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with expertise in frameworks for creating dynamic and responsive web applications
skill.2 content: Building and maintaining the server-side logic of web applications, handling data processing and system integration
skill.3 content: Specializing in creating and developing applications and games using the Unity game engine
skill.4 content: Take responsibility as a leader for 3.5 years, guiding and directing a development team to deliver high-quality software solutions
skill.5 content: Proficient in English and Japanese (JLPT N3) for effective communication in both languages
skill.6 content: Igniting and empowering a team to deliver exceptional software solutions with passion and drive
skill.7 content: Building strong relationships, promotes collaboration, and creates a positive work environment through effective communication

what i do.title: What I do
what i do.content: The programming languages, frameworks, and other tools that I can proficiently utilize

customers.title: Customers
customers.content: Many years of experience working with clients from prominent companies based in Japan

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.content: Feel free to reach out to me using the contact information below or by filling out the form
